attributes.action: Publicise Peak Oil. That oil depletion is likely to bring world economies crashing into recession and energy prices to sky rocket, and thay we in the UK are incredibly vulnerable to this as North Sea oil/gas production crash (to 20% of current levels in the next 10 years)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: North Sea production is crashing at 18% a year. The governments own white paper produced in 2002 said that we will need to import 85% of our energy needs. We also won't be able to rely on the rest of the World. The world's largest oil fields are beginnig to go into terminal decline so raising oil prices as demand from the World increases.
